table.name: vte_reports
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports` ( `vtereportsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `vtereportsname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `folderid` int(11) NOT NULL, `reporttype` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'tabular', `deleted` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `columns_limit` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `summaries_limit` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `include_net_price` tinyint(2) DEFAULT NULL, `on_widget` tinyint(2) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`vtereportsid`), KEY `folderid` (`folderid`), KEY `reporttype` (`reporttype`), KEY `deleted` (`deleted`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_charts
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_charts` ( `vtereportsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `charttype` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `dataseries` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `charttitle` text NOT NULL, `chart_seq` int(11) NOT NULL, `x_group` varchar(255) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_datefilter
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_datefilter` ( `datefilterid` int(19) NOT NULL, `datecolumnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `datefilter` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `startdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `enddate` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`datefilterid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_folder
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_folder` ( `folderid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `foldername` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `state` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'SAVED', `ownerid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`folderid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_labels
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_labels` ( `reportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SC', `columnname` text NOT NULL, `columnlabel` text NOT NULL, `highlight` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', KEY `type` (`type`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_license
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_license` ( `version_type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `license_key` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `license_info` text NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `version_type` (`version_type`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_modules` ( `reportmodulesid` int(19) NOT NULL, `primarymodule` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `secondarymodules` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`reportmodulesid`), KEY `primarymodule` (`primarymodule`), KEY `reportmodulesid` (`reportmodulesid`,`primarymodule`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_profilespermissions
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_profilespermissions` ( `profileid` int(11) NOT NULL, `operation` int(11) NOT NULL, `permissions` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`profileid`,`operation`), KEY `operation` (`operation`), KEY `permissions` (`permissions`), KEY `profileid` (`profileid`,`operation`,`permissions`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_relcriteria
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_relcriteria` ( `queryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnindex` int(11) NOT NULL, `columnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `comparator` varchar(10) DEFAULT '', `value` varchar(200) DEFAULT '', `groupid` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `column_condition` varchar(256) DEFAULT 'and', PRIMARY KEY (`queryid`,`columnindex`), KEY `relcriteria_queryid_idx` (`queryid`), KEY `groupid` (`groupid`), KEY `columnindex` (`columnindex`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_relcriteria_grouping
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_relcriteria_grouping` ( `groupid` int(11) NOT NULL, `queryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `group_condition` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `condition_expression` text, PRIMARY KEY (`groupid`,`queryid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_relcriteria_summaries
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_relcriteria_summaries` ( `reportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnindex` int(11) NOT NULL, `columnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `comparator` varchar(10) DEFAULT '', `value` varchar(200) DEFAULT '', `groupid` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `column_condition` varchar(256) DEFAULT 'and', PRIMARY KEY (`reportid`,`columnindex`), KEY `relcriteria_reportid_idx` (`reportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_reportfilters
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_reportfilters` ( `filterid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`filterid`), KEY `filterid` (`filterid`,`name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_scheduled_reports
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_scheduled_reports` ( `reportid` int(11) NOT NULL, `recipients` text, `schedule` text, `format` text, `next_trigger_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`reportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_selectcolumn
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_selectcolumn` ( `queryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnindex` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `columnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`queryid`,`columnindex`), KEY `selectcolumn_queryid_idx` (`queryid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_selectqfcolumn
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_selectqfcolumn` ( `queryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnindex` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `columnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`queryid`,`columnindex`), KEY `selectqfcolumn_queryid_idx` (`queryid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_selectquery
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_selectquery` ( `queryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `startindex` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `numofobjects` int(19) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`queryid`), KEY `queryid` (`queryid`,`startindex`,`numofobjects`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_selectquery_seq
vte_reports_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_settings` ( `reportid` int(11) NOT NULL, `owner` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `sharingtype` char(7) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'public', PRIMARY KEY (`reportid`), KEY `owner` (`owner`), KEY `sharingtype` (`sharingtype`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_sharing
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_sharing` ( `vtereportsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `shareid` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `setype` varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtereportsid`,`shareid`,`setype`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_sortcol
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_sortcol` ( `sortcolid` int(19) NOT NULL, `reportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `sortorder` varchar(250) DEFAULT 'Asc', `timeline_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT 'rows', `timeline_columnstr` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `timeline_columnfreq` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sortcolid`,`reportid`), KEY `fk_1_vtiger_reportsortcol` (`reportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_summaries
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_summaries` ( `reportsummaryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `summarytype` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnname` varchar(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`reportsummaryid`,`summarytype`,`columnname`), KEY `summarytype` (`summarytype`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_summaries_orderby
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_summaries_orderby` ( `reportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnindex` int(19) NOT NULL, `summaries_orderby` varchar(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `summaries_orderby_type` varchar(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`reportid`,`columnindex`,`summaries_orderby`,`summaries_orderby_type`), KEY `columnindex` (`columnindex`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_summary
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_summary` ( `reportsummaryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `summarytype` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnname` varchar(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`reportsummaryid`,`summarytype`,`columnname`), KEY `reportsummary_reportsummaryid_idx` (`reportsummaryid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_userstatus
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_userstatus` ( `reportid` int(11) NOT NULL, `userid` int(11) NOT NULL, `is_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `is_default` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `sequence` int(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`reportid`,`userid`), KEY `is_active` (`is_active`), KEY `is_default` (`is_default`), KEY `sequence` (`sequence`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_reports_version
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_reports_version` ( `version` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `license` varchar(255) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `version` (`version`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `valid` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
